scripts.clean: rm -f dist/bundle.js && rm -f dist/vendor.js && rm -rf dist/vendor/soundfont
scripts.vendor: cat vendor/midi.min.js vendor/inc/shim/Base64.js vendor/inc/shim/Base64binary.js vendor/inc/shim/WebAudioAPI.js vendor/inc/tuna/tuna.js vendor/midi/audioDetect.js vendor/midi/gm.js vendor/midi/loader.js vendor/midi/plugin.audiotag.js vendor/midi/plugin.webaudio.js vendor/midi/plugin.webmidi.js vendor/util/dom_request_xhr.js vendor/util/dom_request_script.js > dist/vendor.js
scripts.dist: npm run main && npm run sound && npm run vendor
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
